name: DIGIFIZZY Issue Three Common Bundle
description: DIGIFIZZY is the first of its kind. Itâ€™s architected for the metaverse, bringing together creators, anarchists, risk takers and dreamers across web3, fashion, gaming, art, music, crypto and NFTs, to prove out a completely new publishing distribution model.
